## Objectives
1. Understanding the correlation between population growth in cities vs air quality
2. Understanding the correlation between death rate  and Air quality
3. Understanding the correlation between disease growth and Air quality
4. Correlation between airquality vs temperature
4. Building model to predict the air quality based on populating growth
5. Predicting air quality for a given year, month and day
